title: If you receive a friend request from a girl named SantaMaria, don't accept it.
body:
Hello everybody my name is Kevin and I am having a bit of trouble right now and quite frankly, i'm terrified. I don't know exactly what I expect to get out of sharing this on nosleep. Answers maybe? Or maybe someone else has accepted the request and can relate what i'm going through? Anyway i'll just get right to it.

2 nights ago i was sitting at home bored playing on my phone when i noticed i had a new friend request on facebook.

SantaMaria has sent you a friend request do you accept?

With recently being single i have to admit as soon as i seen the request was from a female i got curious and clicked the profile. To my surprise she was smoking hot, tattooes but not to many, perfect body and a gorgeous smile. Lives in the same town as me and it says she single. Now I live in a small town and know pretty much everybody so i was a bit surprised when I seen she was form my town. I just figured she recently moved here or something so I shrugged my shoulders and accepted the request. Almost immediately my messenger beeped and it was from SantaMaria.

SantaMaria is waving at you!

My adrenaline pumped a little as excitement grew and i quickly waved back with a stupid smile on my face.

After that nothing... I waited for another response for 5 minutes or so but still nothing. I felt kind of dumb sitting and staring at my phone, waiting for some girl i became friends with only moments ago on facebook to write me so i set my phone down and went up to grab a snack.

Beep Beep Beep!

3 times in a row my phone went off sounding i had 3 new messages. I quickly ran back to the grab my phone hoping it was from her. It was. Only the messages were very odd and robotic sounding.

SantaMaria- Hello i'm new to the area how are you?

SantaMaria- I would like to meet new people i'm new to the area how are you?

SantaMaria- Hello I'm new to the area how are you?

"Great a damn scammer... idiot" I scowled myself for being so niave.

Annoyed at myself i walked to the kitchen to continue my snack raid. It was my day off and i planned on binge watching horror movies and pigging out. I know, i could've went out and tried to meet some girls out in the real world instead of stupid facebook but hey, i was feeling tired and lazy. After i grabbed my ice cream and mountain dew i plopped back down in the recliner and picked out the movie "Insidious". It was dark out now probably around 10:00 pm and felt like the perfect mood to get myself all scared and prepare to sleep with all the lights on. I'm a bit of a chicken but for some reason i love horror movies, always have. I was only a few minutes into the movie when i heard the beep from my messenger again.

SantaMaria- Can i come over?

"What the fuck?" I said out loud to myself.

Me- Who is this?

SantaMaria- My name is SantaMaria i'm new to the area.

Me- Ok... well sorry no i don't know you at all and have never spoken to you before lol.

SantaMaria- I'm new to the area and am looking for friends, we could watch a scary movie together.

I felt my heart skip a little bit, this was an odd coincidence and of course i had to be watching a scary movie at the moment.

Me- Sorry i don't like horror movies.

That was obviously a lie.

SantaMaria- Then why are you watching one now? Alone...

After that last message my heart hammered through my chest and i frantically looked around my living room. This had to be one of my friends playing a prank on me, it had to.

Me- Very funny, who is this?

SantaMaria- My name is SantaMaria.

Me- Is this you James?

I was hopeful my brother would confess and i could breath normal again. I was scared shitless and felt like something was very wrong, Like a sense of dread.

SantaMaria- My name is SantaMaria i'm new to the area. I'm coming over now.

My heart was pounding harder than it ever had before, this didn't seem like a joke anyone i knew would pull on me. I looked in all of my rooms and out the windows just hoping to see someone, anyone outside that i knew laughing at the joke they pulled on me. Only no one was outside, i was alone out in the country with some crazy person online telling me they are coming over.

Me- No, if you do i will call the police!

I stared at my phone waiting for what felt like an hour for this mystery women to reply. I was so focused that once i looked up i didn't even notice my t.v. was turned off and i was sitting in a pitch black room.

"What the fuck... ok Kevin just calm down it's just the sleep mode." I tried to settle my nerves a little but it wasn't doing much good.

BANG BANG BANG!

Three loud knocks on my back door sent me flying through the air yelping like a little girl.

"HOLY SHIT FUCK!" I hollered, giving it away i was obviously home.

SantaMaria- I'm here let me in please

I stared at my phone in horror not knowing what to do. What in the fuck did this person want? I quickly dialed 911 on my phone and waited for the operator to answer.

"911 whats your emergency?" A womens voice answered.

"Hi my name is Kevin and someone is trying to break into my home, i need someone to get out here as quick as they can!" I whispered into the phone as quickly and quietly as i could.

"Sir did you say someone is trying to break into your home? Where are they now?" Her voice now sounded concerned.

"I don't know! I live on *** Perry lane ***** Michigan please fucking hurry!" I pleaded.

"Sir an officer is being sent to your locati..." The phone went dead.

"Hello... Hello!" I was practically shouting.

The line went dead and i was left in the pitch black house with an eerie silence.

I quietly tip toed to the kitchen where my back door was so i could try and peek out the window to get a look at who was at my back door. The whole time i crept forward my brain was screaming at me to go hide. Yet my feet kept creeping forward. It was so quiet you could hear a pin drop. Once i got about 5 feet from the door i stopped to listen. At first i didn't hear anything but as I listened closer i could definitely hear someone breathing on the other side of the door.

BANG BANG BANG!

"FUCKING SHIT!" I once again jumped and shouted, giving my position away.

"Fucking idiot!" I cursed myself for being so jumpy.

Beep

The phone sent me cursing again as it scared the shit out of me.

SantaMaria- Open the door.

Me- No! Police are on the way you'd better leave!

SantaMaria- I'll be back.

The silence was interrupted by feet shuffling as someone started to walk away from the door. I was to afraid to go look out the back door window so i quietly snuck to the kitchen window to at least get somewhat of a description to give the police. I slightly pulled the curtain to the side and nearly jumped back taking my table out with me.

"HOLY FUCK!" I hit my head hard as i crashed to the ground.

There was a ladies face pressed against my window with her eyes bulging and bloodshot with a blank expression on her face. Thankfully the curtain snapped shut as i went flying back. Something was very wrong with this women... She gave off a horrible vibe and i have a feeling her intentions with me are absolutely horrifying. By the grace of god i seen red and blue lights flashing through my window as the police pulled in. I scrambled to my feet and ran as quick as i could to the front door yanking it open.

"Shes out back!" I screamed pointing to the back of my house.

The police signaled for me to get down and ran around out back. I sat expecting to hear gunshots or shouting or something but it was just as quiet as before. After a few minutes the police came back around and asked me what exactly i had seen. I told them everything right from the beginning and showed them the messages and everything. They wrote everything and down and advised i go stay with a friend or family member for the night. I felt so helpless and terrified that nothing was being done, couldn't be done... She somehow managed to move quickly enough through the woods that the police were unable to even catch a glimpse of her.

I called my brother and headed over to his house for the night and of course had to give him the whole nights events as well. It took hours but i was finally able to sleep and he drove me home this morning. I'm currently sitting here scared shitless because my brother works tonight and about 10 minutes ago my phone beeped again.

SantaMaria- Hello can i come over?
author: Stalked_by_u
